dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The life cycle of boxboard starts from the collection of waste paper, through pulping of waste paper, copying, rewinding, packaging and warehousing of boxboard, until it is delivered to the user or distributor, and it also includes the unit processes of energy production, chemical production, and transport, etc. Since boxboard products are the raw materials for downstream enterprises to produce products, the properties of boxboard have been changed after forming products. Since boxboard products are the raw materials for downstream enterprises to produce products, the formation of products has changed the properties of boxboard, and the use of products and the treatment of waste after use are not within the system boundary of this study, i.e., the "cradle-to-gate" approach. Fuel extraction, transport and infrastructure production are not included in the scope of this study.
箱纸板生命周期从废纸的收集开始，经过废纸制 浆、箱纸板的抄造、复卷、包装入库，直至送到用户 或经销商，同时还包含能源生产、化学品生产、运输 等单元过程。由于箱纸板产品是下游企业生产产品的 原料，形成产品后已改变了箱纸板的属性，产品的使 用和使用后废弃物的处理不在本研究的系统边界内， 即为 “摇篮-到-大门” 的方法。其中燃料开采、交通 工具、基础设施的生产不在本研究范围内。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: In this study, 1000 kg of cardboard product was selected as the functional unit.

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: 废纸在收集、分类过程中需进行运输、分拣、打包等过程，会产生 GHG 排放。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The process described pertains to the production of recycled cardboard, beginning with the collection of waste paper. The lifecycle of recycled cardboard includes the manufacturing stages such as pulping of waste paper, creation of the cardboard, rewinding, packaging, and storage. Once it is delivered to the users or distributors, it serves as raw material for downstream manufacturing industries, effectively transforming the nature of the cardboard. The usage of cardboard is widespread in the production of boxes and packaging materials used by various industries. This dataset specifically covers a 'cradle-to-gate' scenario, which includes all the stages up until the product is ready to be shipped to the consumer, but excludes the use and end-of-life treatment of the product. The extraction of fuels, production of vehicles, and construction of infrastructure are excluded from this study. The unit process assessments in this dataset can provide guidance for carbon accounting and reduction in China's papermaking industry.

该工艺涉及从废纸收集开始的再生纸箱纸板生产过程。再生纸箱纸板的生命周期包括废纸制浆、纸板制造、复卷、包装及入库等阶段。产品交付给用户或分销商后，作为下游制造行业的原料，从而改变了纸箱纸板的性质。纸箱纸板广泛应用于各种行业的箱体和包装材料生产。本数据集特别涵盖了“摇篮到大门”的情景，包括所有准备好发运给消费者之前的阶段，但不包括产品的使用和产品寿命终结处理。研究中不包括燃料的开采、车辆的生产和基础设施的建设。本数据集中的单元过程评估可以为中国造纸行业的碳核算和减排提供指导。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: According to the research of the enterprise, the waste paper used comes from the United States, Europe and China, so the emissions generated by different modes of transport are allocated according to the amount of waste paper from the source and the mode of transport. 2. During the production process, the allocation of steam, electricity and other energy consumption is based on the output of the products, and the allocation of pollutants emitted in the process of energy production is based on the amount of energy consumed in the various units of the process.
根据企业调研情况，所用废纸来源于美国、欧洲及国内，因此不同运输方式产生的排放根据废纸来源地的用量及运输方式进行分配。2.生产过程中，蒸汽、 电力等能源消耗的分配依据产品产量进行分配; 对能源生产过程中所排放的污染物的分配，根据各单元过程的能源消耗量进行分配。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: In this study, the activity data of the boxboard factory for one year was collected, analysed, filtered and calculated to get the input and output data for each tonne of boxboard produced. During the data calculation process, primary activity level data could not be obtained due to some reasons such as a process not under organisational control, high cost of data research, etc. In cases where primary activity level data is not available, secondary level data is sought to fill the gap. The main sources of secondary activity data in this study were the ecoinvent database and data from the literature.
本研究采集了箱纸板工厂 一年的活动数据，并进行分析、筛选，计算得到生产每吨箱纸板的输入、输出数据。数据计算过程中，由于某些原因，如某个过程不在组织控制、数据调研成本过高等原因导致初级活动水平数据无法获取。对于无法获取初级活动水平数据的情况，寻求次级水平数据予以填补。本研究中次级活动数据主要来源有ecoinvent 数据库和文献资料中的数据。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 张清文 & 陈曦. 100%OCC生产的箱纸板碳足迹评价. 中国造纸 34, 20–24 (2015).
张清文 & 陈曦. 100%OCC生产的箱纸板碳足迹评价. 中国造纸 34, 20–24 (2015).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using this data for Life Cycle Assessment, pay close attention to the system boundaries and exclusions, such as the exclusion of equipment and building-related production and maintenance processes. The data set focuses on cardboard production within a defined boundary and excludes post-consumer use and waste treatment. GHG emissions related to the collection, sorting, and baling of waste paper should be accounted for. The methodology used for allocation of emissions from transportation should reflect the amount of waste paper sourced from different locations and the mode of transport. Energy use from steam and electricity during production should also be appropriately allocated based on output. Data gaps from primary activities have been filled with secondary data, primarily from the ecoinvent database and literature sources. The study sets a cutoff rule for trivial emission sources constituting less than 1% of the total, with an overall allowance of omitted sources not exceeding 5% of the product's carbon footprint. To comply with PAS 2050, emissions from the production of capital goods should not be included in the product's lifecycle GHG emissions. The functional unit chosen for the study is 1000 kg of cardboard product.

在使用这些数据进行生命周期评估时，需要特别注意系统边界和排除事项，例如不考虑设备和建筑相关的生产与维护过程。数据集侧重于定义边界内的纸箱纸板生产，并排除了消费后使用和废物处理。需要计入与废纸收集、分类和打包相关的温室气体排放。运输过程中排放分配的方法应反映不同来源地废纸的用量和运输方式。生产过程中蒸汽和电力的使用也应根据产量适当分配。由于初级活动数据缺失，已使用来自 ecoinvent 数据库和文献资料的次级数据填补。研究设定的删减规则是对于单一排放源占排放总量不到 1% 的不予考虑，被省略的排放源总比例不得超过产品碳足迹的 5%。为了符合 PAS 2050 标准，资产性商品生产所产生的排放不应计入产品生命周期内的温室气体排放。研究选定的功能单位是 1000 公斤的纸箱纸板产品。

completeness.common:other: The deletion principle of this study is that if a single source accounts for less than 1% of the total emissions, the carbon emissions generated in the production process will not be considered. However, the total proportion of deleted sources should not exceed 5% of the carbon footprint of the whole product. 2. PAS 2050 stipulates that emissions from the production of asset-based goods should not be included in the GHG emissions of the product life cycle. In this study, production and maintenance processes related to production equipment and building facilities are also not considered.
本研究的删减原则为单一排放源占排放总量不到 1% 的，在生产过程中产生的碳排放不予考 虑。但是，删减的排放源的总比例不得超过整个产品碳足迹的 5% 。 2.PAS 2050规定资产性商品生产所产生的排放不应纳入产品生命周期内 GHG 排放。本研究对生产设备与建筑设施相关的生产、维护过程也不予以考虑。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
